column2: Falling head permeability apparatus consisting of the following:
A  4  inch  inside  diameter  standpipe  that  is  at  least  25  inches  high  with  2  timing  marks  approximately
A top support that will fit over the mold and into which the standpipe will fit with a clamping system to
ensure that it will not leak during testing.
A bottom support into which the mold can fit and capable of supporting the apparatus with a clamping
system to ensure that it will not leak during testing.  Include a flap gate in the bottom of the bottom support
to keep the water from flowing until after the testing has begun.
